data.comment: The match has started.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Paranaense are pushing forward but Carlos Eduardo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Paranaense's half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 6, Paranaense's Leo Cittadini gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Palmeiras defender.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Paranaense.
Throw-in Paranaense.
In the minute 8, Patrick de Paula is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Throw-in for Paranaense close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the away team a throw-in.
Paranaense will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Palmeiras.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 18, Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Free kick Paranaense.
Lucas Halter (Paranaense) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
Patrick de Paula for Palmeiras is back on the field again.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Palmeiras at Arena da Baixada.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 22, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 24, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Khellven (Paranaense) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 26, Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Paranaense close to the penalty box.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 28, Goal kick for Palmeiras at Arena da Baixada.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Paranaense throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
In the minute 29, Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the away team a throw-in.
Paranaense to take a throw-in in Palmeiras territory.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Paranaense.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Paranaense in the half of Palmeiras.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Curitiba to check on Maycon Nikao, who is grimacing with pain.
Geuvanio (Paranaense) has replaced the possibly injured Maycon Nikao at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 33, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Paranaense.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 34, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Palmeiras are in shooting range from this free kick.
Wellington (Paranaense) has received a yellow card from Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Palmeiras drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Paranaense throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
Throw-in Paranaense.
Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 39, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Paranaense.
Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 40, Free kick Palmeiras.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 43, Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Paranaense a goal kick.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Curitiba.
Throw-in Paranaense.
Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
In the minute 45, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Arena da Baixada.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Paranaense.
Free kick Paranaense.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 48, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gabriel Menino for Palmeiras is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Paranaense.
Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 55, It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Throw-in Paranaense.
Rony of Palmeiras gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 57, Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 58, Vitinho for Paranaense has been booked by Caio Max Augusto Vieira and receives a first yellow card.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In Curitiba, Luiz Adriano (Palmeiras) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 60, Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Paranaense a goal kick.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rony of Palmeiras is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 63, The home team have replaced Richard with Marquinhos Gabriel. This is the second substitution made today by Dorival Silvestre Junior.
Pedrinho is replacing Vitinho for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 65, Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
Can Paranaense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Palmeiras's half?
In the minute 66, Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Palmeiras.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paranaense are coming forward and Marquinhos Gabriel gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Palmeiras at Arena da Baixada.
The away team replace Luiz Adriano with Willian.
Free kick Palmeiras.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Palmeiras at Arena da Baixada.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
In the minute 71, Palmeiras's Patrick de Paula breaks free at Arena da Baixada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Palmeiras needs to be cautious. Paranaense have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 74, Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the home team a throw-in.
Vanderlei Luxemburgo (Palmeiras) is making a second substitution, with Ze Rafael replacing Gabriel Menino.
Throw-in Palmeiras.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 77, Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 78, Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
Dorival Silvestre Junior is making the team's fourth substitution at Arena da Baixada with Vinicius Mingotti replacing Carlos Eduardo.
Dorival Silvestre Junior is making the team's fifth substitution at Arena da Baixada with Fernando Canesin replacing Leo Cittadini.
In the minute 80, Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Paranaense drive into the zone and Pedrinho is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
In the minute 81, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 82, Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Raphael Veiga is replacing Rony for the away team.
In the minute 83, Palmeiras make their fourth substitution with Gustavo Scarpa replacing Bruno Henrique.
Ramires is on a sub for Lucas Lima for Palmeiras.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Caio Max Augusto Vieira.
In the minute 85, Caio Max Augusto Vieira awards the home team a throw-in.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
Palmeiras's Gustavo Scarpa is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 86, Raphael Veiga for Palmeiras gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
Fernando Canesin is booked for the home team.
In the minute 87, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Caio Max Augusto Vieira signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Paranaense's half.
Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 88, Throw-in Palmeiras.
Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Free kick in a good position for Palmeiras!
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Throw-in high up the field for Palmeiras in Curitiba.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Curitiba. The final score is 0-1.
Goal! Raphael Veiga gives Palmeiras a 0-1 lead.
Thiago Heleno (Paranaense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
